csri.poeticon.praxicon
Class XML_Utils

java.lang.Object
  csri.poeticon.praxicon.XML_Utils

public class XML_Utils
extends java.lang.Object

A class that helps you to serialize any entity of the csri.poeticon.praxicon.db.entities as an XML

XML_Utils

Method Detail

saveToXML

public static void saveToXML(java.util.List objects,
                             java.lang.String XML_FileName)
Saves all the entities as an XML file. The file should not exist, or should be empty (the function appends the xml content in the end of the file)

Parameters:
objects - The entities of the csri.poeticon.praxicon.db.entities that are going to be serialized as an XML
XML_FileName - The name of the XML file (with or without a path)

saveToXML

public static void saveToXML(CollectionOfConcepts collection,
                             java.lang.String XML_FileName)
Saves all the entities as an XML file. The file should not exist, or should be empty (the function appends the xml content in the end of the file)

Parameters:
collection - The entities of the csri.poeticon.praxicon.db.entities that are going to be serialized as an XML
XML_FileName - The name of the XML file (with or without a path)
